input: Which one of the following rights conferred by the Constitution of India is also available to non-citizens?

options.A: Freedom of speech, assembly and form association
options.B: Freedom to move, reside and settle in any part of the territory of India
options.C: Freedom to acquire property or to carry on any occupation, trade or business

explanation: Freedom to acquire property or to carry on any occupation trade or business is also available to non citizens.
